Title: Timberwolves name Chris Finch new head coach as former Raptors assistant replaces Ryan Saunders
Description: The Minnesota Timberwolves lost to the New York Knicks on Sunday to fall to a league-worst 7-24 this season. That defeat turned out to be the last straw for management as the team announced shortly after the game it fired head coach Ryan Saunders.
Author: CBSSports.com
